name: @defai.digital/ax-cli
description: Enterprise-Class AI Command Line Interface - Primary support for GLM (General Language Model) with multi-provider AI orchestration powered by AutomatosX.

custom.build:legacy: npm run build:schemas && tsc && chmod +x dist/index.js

gotchas: ESM requires .js extension in imports even for TypeScript files
TypeScript strict mode is enabled - null checks required
Monorepo: use pnpm --filter <pkg> to target specific packages
Run single test: pnpm test -- path/to/test.ts

todos.text: Write failure is non-critical, continue execution

hotspots.reason: large file, high fan-out, high fan-in, many functions
large file, medium fan-out, high fan-in, many functions
large file, high fan-out, many functions
large file, high fan-out, many functions
large file, high fan-in, many functions
large file, medium fan-out, many functions
large file, medium fan-out, many functions
